name: Quest for the Youth Potion
description:
Project made for the TeenyTiny DragonRuby MiniGameJam.

Little project that I made while learning how to use the DragonRuby game engine.

Click in the ghosts to banish them and protect the mage, helping him reach the youth potion.

used sounds obtained in freesound.org:

"ghost whispers" by litruv - edited to loop
"magic spell" by qubodup - edited to make two sounds for the spell effects
